name: THAILAND conference in RANGSIT UNIVERSITY
content: SUSSH 2019 is an international forum in Thailand (Pathum Thani) for the presentation of technological advances and research results including start up in the fields of Science and Technology, Social Science and Humanities. RSUSSH 2019 is entitled “Big Data and New Face of Asia: Reflection in Science, Arts, Social Sciences, and Humanities”. This will be an academic platform for both Thai and foreign professionals to present their research findings and share their experience or shoot the start up idea which further leads to the promotion of a strong collaboration within national and international research networks.
